notes: Seed list curated from notable public podcast directories/feeds with accessible RSS endpoints. Focused on high-signal journalism, economics, technology, and culture shows with consistent publishing cadence.

sources.title: Up First (NPR)
sources.rationale: Daily news briefing with high topical coverage; NPR publishes a stable RSS feed with structured metadata.

sources.title: Planet Money (NPR)
sources.rationale: Economics and business explainers; consistent production quality and rich summaries.

sources.title: The Indicator from Planet Money (NPR)
sources.rationale: Short-form economy coverage; frequent episodes for dense indexing.

sources.title: Code Switch (NPR)
sources.rationale: Race/culture reporting with high editorial quality; good metadata and summaries.

sources.title: Hidden Brain (NPR)
sources.rationale: Behavioral science interviews; high listener demand and evergreen topics.

sources.title: Invisibilia (NPR)
sources.rationale: Narrative science/psychology reporting; evergreen episodes and strong descriptions.

sources.title: TED Radio Hour (NPR)
sources.rationale: Curated TED talks with themes; good transcripts on TED side and structured show notes.

sources.title: Tiny Desk Concerts - Audio (NPR)
sources.rationale: Music performances with consistent publishing cadence; attractive for media search demos.

sources.title: Itâ€™s Been a Minute (NPR)
sources.rationale: Culture commentary; high topical diversity for entity extraction.

sources.title: The Daily (The New York Times)
sources.rationale: Flagship daily news podcast with rich summaries and broad coverage.
